home.title: Hi, I am Pandu Wahyudi,
home.description: I'm an enthusiastic web developer always looking for new experiences. Each project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and create solutions that are both functional and enjoyable to use.

skills.title: Tools & Skills
skills.description: I specialize in using modern tools and technologies to buildefficient, high-quality web applications. With experience invarious projects, I create responsive, reliable, and user focusedsolutions, from intuitive interfaces to robust backends, ensuringoptimal performance and seamless integration.

contact.title: Lets
contact.description: Based in Indonesia, I am ready to work with you in both Indonesian and English. Do you have a great idea you'd like to bring to life? Let's start our collaboration!

experience.description1: A web-based information system designed to improve healthcare services at Itera Polyclinic. Built using Laravel and Tailwind CSS, this system includes features for managing patients, medical records, and medications. I worked as a fullstack developer, handling the entire development process.
experience.description2: A platform that integrates a promotional landing page with an admin system for content management. Developed with React and NestJS, I contributed as a front-end developer, focusing on implementing responsive UI designs and ensuring optimal user experiences.
experience.description3: A web-based point-of-sale system designed to streamline cashier operations at Yang's Grosir. Built with Next.js and NestJS, I worked as a front-end developer, responsible for implementing UI designs and integrating APIs to connect various features with the backend.
experience.title4: Road Repair Budget Calculation Information System for Lampung Province
experience.description4: A web-based system that supports the Lampung Province Public Works and Highways Department (BMBK) in accurately and efficiently calculating road repair budgets. Developed using Laravel and Bootstrap, this system provides a user-friendly interface and automated calculation features. As a fullstack developer, I was responsible for designing the UI, developing key modules, and ensuring the system met user requirements.
